problem.markdown: What does it mean to have P = NP? ( ) Solving a really hard problem in NP ( ) Solving a problem in P (x) Solving a problem in NP that runs in polynomial time ( ) All of the above
problem.p: What does it mean to have P = NP?

choicegroup.choice: Solving a really hard problem in NP
Solving a problem in NP that runs in polynomial time
